title: Blank & Jones - Relax Edition 2 - Sun & Moon
description:
Blank & Jones - Relax: Edition 2

# Original Release Date: April 25, 2006
# Number of Discs: 2
# Label: Water Music Records

Blank & Jones offer up a soothing collection of ambient Balearic tunes and low-tempo chillout tracks with the second edition of their "Relax" series. Spread out over two discs, disc one (called "Sun") seems more focused on pure leisure,while the second "Moon" disc offers some slightly more uptempo tunes while still maintaining a calming mood overall. 

Disc: 1 "Sun"
1. Balearic Blue 	
2. Closer to Me 
3. Crusin' 	
4. Revealed 
5. Loneliness 
6. Twilight
7. I Love You
8. Lightning
9. Fallen
10. City of Angels
11. Ocean Tribe
12. Summer Sun
13. Someone Like You
14. Warm Weather


Disc: 2 "Moon"
1. Revealed [Bliss Remix]
2. Twilight [Chill & Grill Mix]
3. City of Angels [Beach House Mix]
4. Balearic Blue [Sa Trincha Mix]
5. Don't U Know
6. Loneliness [Chill House Mix]
7. Stars Shine Bright [L.A. by Night Mix]
8. I Love You [Late Night Mix]
9. Feel the Sunshine
10. Rio Loungin'
11. Pefect Silence [Dub Session]
12. Mind of the Wonderful [Acoustic Version]


(This was originally passworded and zipped... I hate people that do that so I cracked the password and re-uploaded this for free... no need to thank me, just enjoy the music and remember to seed.)
